abstract: There are signs of market recovery this morning.
snippet: There are signs of market recovery this morning.
lead_paragraph: The great panic has subsided, at least for the moment. Dow futures are up 190 points this morning, and the declines in Europe are relatively mild.

abstract: The political lynching of truth-telling in accounting is gathering steam. President Nicolas Sarkozy of France met with bankers today and promised proposals soon. Dow Jones says Mr. Sarkozy wants to block market value accounting, which he blames for the problem.
lead_paragraph: The political lynching of truth-telling in accounting is gathering steam. President Nicolas Sarkozy of France met with bankers today and promised proposals soon. Dow Jones says Mr. Sarkozy wants to block market value accounting, which he blames for the problem.
